home-text: Over 2 years of experience in the tech industry. I specialize in building innovative web and mobile applications using technologies such as React, Angular and Node.js
about-h1: I’m a passionate software developer looking for my first opportunity
about-text: Beyond coding, I'm a coffee enthusiast, a cat lover, and a an athlete who likes to spend his free time exercising. I am currently seeking opportunities to bring my skills and enthusiasm to a tech company in the Brazil, United States or Europe and am excited about the prospect of relocating to pursue new challenges
